0.6.name: wordpress/ad-wrap
0.6.description:
This plugin will mark the key parts of a blog post so that context based ad services can identify the post content and comments for the best ad matching (thus avoiding the static content that is irrelevant for context ad matching).

Context ad services currently supported are :

  1. Google Adsense
  2. Kontera ContextLink
  3. Infolinks

This plug-in is based on work originally done by John Godley (http://urbangiraffe.com/plugins/google-ad-wrap/)
